sentences.english: When he says "take care" the words are inflected with humanity.
sentences.chinese: 當他說‘一路小心’，言語間充滿了人性。

sentences.english: Speech acts are the important field in pragmatics.
sentences.chinese: 言語行爲是語用學研究的一個重要領域。

sentences.english: Zhao Zigeng smiled, and did not care to verbal stimuli "."
sentences.chinese: 趙子庚笑笑，毫不在意並以言語刺激宇文。

sentences.english: It is difficult to verbalize his lifetime of frustrations.
sentences.chinese: 他坎坷的一生很難用言語來表達。

sentences.english: The words of the Preacher, the son of David, king in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 在耶路撒冷作王，大衛的兒子，傳道者的言語。

sentences.english: There is also a hierarchy of offensiveness that needs to be observed.
sentences.chinese: 攻擊性言語也分等級，這需要我們留意。
正直的言語力量何其大。

sentences.english: For now it would be heavier than the sand of the sea: therefore my words are swallowed up.
sentences.chinese: 現今都比海沙更重，所以我的言語急躁。

sentences.english: Deeds are fruits, words are but leaver.
sentences.chinese: 行動時果實，言語只是葉子。

sentences.english: Hear the word of the LORD, ye that tremble at his word;
sentences.chinese: 你們因耶和華言語戰兢的人，當聽他的話。

sentences.english: For the kingdom of God is not in word, but in power.
sentences.chinese: 因爲神的國不在乎言語，乃在乎權能。

sentences.english: It is not always easy to put one's ideas into words.
sentences.chinese: 思想用言語表達出來並不總是一件容易的事。

sentences.english: The words of king Lemuel, the prophecy that his mother taught him.
sentences.chinese: 利慕伊勒王的言語，是他母親教訓他的真言。

sentences.english: Take out that to throw from the breast to thousand if Xi, week after gentleman no longer lecture.
sentences.chinese: 從懷中掏出那封祕卷扔向千若兮，周繼君不再言語。

sentences.english: I'm no orator , as he is.
sentences.chinese: 我不善言語，而他卻是位雄辯家。

sentences.english: House Orien calls upon swiftblades to defend the house's interests with weapon and word.
sentences.chinese: 歐瑞恩家族號召快刃們用武器與言語守護家族的利益。

definition: vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
to speak/to say/to talk/to gossip/to tell stories/talk/word
word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases)/term (e.g. technical term)/expression
to question/to ask questions/to inquire/to bring to account/to interrogate
